so_21042534: awk \
-v start="$(date +"%F %R" --date=@$(expr `date +%s` - 180))" \
-v end="$(date "+%F %R")" \
'$0 ~ start, $0 ~ end' \
agent.log

Explanations about Options.--date: display time described by STRING, not 'now'
